CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 28, 1958, pg. A11, reads: "Alpha Wives pose prettily for the camera making a lovely picture at the formal given by their husbands' fraternity. Seated, front row, left to right: Mmes. Wilbur Douglas, Forrest Parr, Charles Angell, Howard Hairston, president, Alpha Wives; H. D. Primas Sr., Gaines Bradford and Lewis Jenkins of Washington, D.C. Second row: Mmes. William Walker, Arthur Stevenson, Leroy Patrick, Max Johnson, John Cundieff, Nathen Page, McKinley King, William B. Miller and Oswald Mickens, Last row: Mmes. Clifford McPherson, William Nicholson, Morris Fountain, Henry D. McCullough and James Simmons. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women in ball gowns, front row from left: Mrs. Wilbur Douglas, Mrs. Forrest Parr, Mrs. Charles Angell, Mrs. Howard Hairston, Mrs. H. D. Primas Sr., Mrs. Gaines Bradford, Mrs. Lewis Jenkins; second row: Mrs. William Walker, Mrs. Arthur Stevenson, Mrs. Leroy Patrick, Mrs. Max Johnson, Mrs. John Cundieff, Mrs. Nathen Page, Ruth King, Mrs. William B. Miller, and Mrs. Oswald Mickens; last row: Mrs. Clifford McPherson, Mrs. William Nicholson, Miriam Sharpe Fountain, Mrs. Henry D. McCullough, Mrs. James Simmons, posed in the Georgian ballroom of Hotel Webster Hall with sign inscribed "Alpha Omicron Lambda 30th Anniversary" for the Alpha Phi Alpha 30th Anniversary Ball
